title: Venus Affairs - Night Chamber: Mission 3
description: Ensign Merritt Hardy anticipates another one-night stand with a run-of-the-mill alien during a SYNEX session (Synergistic Sex). After all, it's her job. But the highly charged erotic encounter threatens to overpower her.The missions of The Venus Affairs are erotic short stories which involve intense romantic and sexual encounters between the women of the Starship Venus and all manner of alien species throughout the universe. This explicit content is intended for mature audiences only.
author: Abbi Aaker
